Txt_Talk_Pyramid_1F_SearchObj_Statue_1.Text: It's an extremely imposing statue. Perhaps it's of a long-dead king who sleeps somewhere in the heart of the pyramid...

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_3F_SearchObj_Door_1.Text: It's an extremely heavy stone door. There doesn't seem to be any way of opening it.

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_3F_SearchObj_Switch_1.Text: A round switch is set into the floor in front of you. Press it?

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_3F_SearchObj_Switch_2.Text: But that one's already been pressed...

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_3F_SearchObj_Switch_4.Text: The sound of stone grinding against stone can be heard in the distance...

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_3F_Boss_01_1.Text: How did you find your way here!?

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_3F_Boss_01_2.Text: Don't tell me you're lost? Heh, it hardly matters.

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_3F_Boss_01_3.Text: I'm feeling kind today so I won't make you suffer...much!

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_3F_Boss_01_5.Text: Oh, but I mustn't let down the Archfiend... This key cannot fall into your hands...

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_3F_Boss_01_6.Text: Listen: don't celebrate just yet. My life may be spent, but the boss troll will make short work of you...

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_4F_SearchObj_Treasure_1.Text: A sinister, disembodied voice floats eerily through the air...

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_4F_SearchObj_Treasure_2.Text: Who dares defile the treasures of the mightiest of monarchs?

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_4F_SearchObj_Coffin_2.Text: It's made of stone, and incredibly heavy. The lid won't budge an inch.

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_4F_SearchObj_Coffin_3.Text: It's made of stone, and incredibly heavy.

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_B1F_Spell_Disable_1.Text: A mysterious force is preventing you from casting spells!

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_B2F_SearchObj_Coffin_1.Text: An ancient-looking sarcophagus sits on the slab. Open it?

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_B2F_SearchObj_Coffin_2.Text: {LEADER} gingerly lifts the lid of the sarcophagus...

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_B2F_SearchObj_Coffin_3.Text: A set of solid gold claws gleams softly within. They must be worth an absolute fortune!

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_B2F_SearchObj_Coffin_5.Text: A sinister, disembodied voice floats eerily through the air...

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_B2F_SearchObj_Coffin_6.Text: May the curse of the ancients strike down the thief of the golden claws!

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_B2F_SearchObj_Coffin_7.Text: An ancient-looking sarcophagus sits on the slab.

Txt_Talk_Pyramid_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0010_010.Text: *: The round button is the sun; the small button opens the way.
*: The easternmost west and the westernmost east... Try pushing the sun button!
...and a monster is revealed before your eyes!
{LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...
